project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, specifically calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns provided by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to read the CSV file input from the user
Implement function to calculate the mean for specified numerical columns
Implement function to calculate the median for specified numerical columns
Implement function to calculate the mode for specified numerical columns
Implement user interface for selecting numerical columns for analysis
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
